channel.title: Lectures & Homework on MTH 141
channel.description: Recent content in Lectures & Homework on MTH 141

item.title: Weeks 1-4
item.description: Tuesday, August 27 Recitation: Join me today at 2-2:50pm ETfor our first live online recitation as we discuss the course, look over the syllabus, and answer any questions that you may have. Use the link on the recitation page of the Course Handbook to join the meeting. Tuesday, September 3 We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Tuesday, September 10 We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Tuesday, September 17 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Section 2.

item.title: Weeks 5-8
item.description: Tuesday, September 24 We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Thursday, September 26 Exam 1 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.5 hour exam). A summary of your instructor-approved exam locations is posted on UBlearns under “Your Grades and Exam Arrangements”. Tuesday, October 1 We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Section 3.

item.title: Weeks 9-12
item.description: Tuesday, October 22 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Lectures Below are the two lectures assigned for this week. Additional Resources and Review Material (optional) Section 4.1: Below is the lecture we use to introduce the concepts of Maximum and Minimum in another course. This may be a helpful resource, if you find yourself struggling with this section. Thursday, October 24 Exam 2 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.

item.title: Weeks 13-16
item.description: Tuesday, November 19 Recitation We have recitation scheduled for today at 2-2:50pm ET Lectures Below are the three lectures assigned for this week, all due on December 3rd. Thursday, November 21 Exam 3 is scheduled for today at 8:45pm-10:15pm ET (it is a 1.5 hour exam). A summary of your instructor-approved exam locations is posted on UBlearns under “Your Grades and Exam Arrangements”.
